messages.msgSnippet: Oh Sandra -- if you could only see me grin and nod everytime i read your posts!!! KathyC in Bryan,Tx ...
messages.messageBody:
Oh Sandra -- if you could only see me grin and nod everytime i read your
posts!!!
KathyC in Bryan,Tx

On Fri, 26 Jan 2001 21:30:53 EST SandraDodd@... writes:
> -=-I was always told never to discuss religion or politics.......
>
> I believe those were very wise words.-=-
>
> That advice applies to tea parties and dinners.
>
> Tea parties and dinners aren't intended to be educational! ;-)

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 952
messages.msgSnippet: -=-I was always told never to discuss religion or politics....... I believe those were very wise words.-=- That advice applies to tea parties and dinners. Tea
messages.messageBody:
-=-I was always told never to discuss religion or politics.......

I believe those were very wise words.-=-

That advice applies to tea parties and dinners.

Tea parties and dinners aren't intended to be educational! ;-)
